title: Is it possible to write 3,000 words in 2 days? - Quora

response.answer_text: I wouldn’t say that you need to practice writing everyday to pull this off. I practice writing maybe once a month or once a year, depending how much time I have. I can usually write around 2000 words in one day so 3000 in 2 days is a completely average amount. Especially when you consider that English has more words than my native language (Polish) - there are modal verbs and “a/an” etc. so it’s easier to write more words.
It is very possible to write 3,000 words in 2 days. However, to be able to effectively pull this off. The writer must have been practicing writing everyday
